mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mypage_guestbook (member_id, content, mypage_owner, profile_file_name) VALUE (#{member_id}, #{content}, #{mypage_owner}, #{profile_file_name})
INSERT INTO mypage_guestbook (member_id, content, mypage_owner) VALUE (#{member_id}, #{content}, #{mypage_owner})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mypage_guestbook WHERE mypage_owner = #{mypage_owner} ORDER BY guestbook_id DESC

SELECT g.*, c.guestbook_comment_id, c.member_id AS comment_writer, c.guestbook_id AS guestbook_id2, c.content AS comment_content FROM mypage_guestbook g LEFT JOIN mypage_guestbook_comment c ON g.guestbook_id = c.guestbook_id WHERE g.mypage_owner = #{member_id} ORDER BY g.guestbook_id DESC , c.guestbook_comment_id DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mypage_guestbook_comment (member_id, guestbook_id, content) VALUE (#{member_id}, #{guestbook_id}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mypage_guestbook_comment WHERE guestbook_id = #{guestbook_id} ORDER BY guestbook_comment_id
